name: Keap
natural_language_description: 这是 Keap 节点。主要用于: Consume Keap API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: company

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: delete
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many files

companyName.name: companyName
companyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company Name | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: addressField (值: None) - Email field of each Contact record to address the email to, such as 'EmailAddress1', 'EmailAddress2', 'EmailAddress3', defaulting to the contact's primary email
htmlContent (值: None) - The HTML-formatted content of the email, encoded in Base64
plainContent (值: None) - The plain-text content of the email, encoded in Base64

addressesUi.name: addressesUi
addressesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Addresses | 默认值: {}

faxesUi.name: faxesUi
faxesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Faxes | 默认值: {}

phonesUi.name: phonesUi
phonesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Phones | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: since (值: None) - Date to start searching from
until (值: None) - Date to search to
order (值: None) - Attribute to order items by

duplicateOption.name: duplicateOption
duplicateOption.description: Performs duplicate checking by one of the following options: Email, EmailAndName. If a match is found using the option provided, the existing contact will be updated.
duplicateOption.natural_language_description: 参数名: Duplicate Option | 作用: Performs duplicate checking by one of the following options: Email, EmailAndName. If a match is found using the option provided, the existing contact will be updated. | 默认值: email | (必填项)

emailsUi.name: emailsUi
emailsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Emails | 默认值: {}

socialAccountsUi.name: socialAccountsUi
socialAccountsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Social Accounts | 默认值: {}

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The infusionsoft user to send the email on behalf of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Name or ID | 作用: The infusionsoft user to send the email on behalf of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note ID | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: contactId (值: None) - Filter based on Contact ID, if user has permission to see Contact files
name (值: None) - Filter files based on name, with '*' preceding or following to indicate LIKE queries
permission (值: None) - Filter based on the permission of files
type (值: None) - Filter based on the type of file
viewable (值: None) - Include public or private files in response

tagIds.name: tagIds
tagIds.default: Tag IDs, multiple IDs can be set separated by comma.
tagIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag IDs | 默认值: Tag IDs, multiple IDs can be set separated by comma. | (必填项)
